entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent namespace declarations in XElement. #100940
  • [browser][MT] System.Reflection.Tests - Assertion: sgen-scan-object.h:93 #100932
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] WebSocketClient_ResponseCloseInDifferentThread #100931
    9.0.0
  • Add PublishAot flag gives package restore error using global.json #100929
  • Tensor<T> and supporting types #100924
  • [wasi] Align build configuration with NativeAOT-LLVM #100921
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Opinionated restrictions for TypeName parsing #100920
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT crashes on macOS arm64 during `StackFrameIterator::CalculateCurrentMethodState` #100919
  • JIT: Optimize counted loops by reversing them #100915
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `Interlocked.[Compare]Exchange` for `bool` #100914
  • JIT: Add support for strength reduction #100913
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Tests.HttpWebRequestTest_Async.GetResponseAsync_ParametersAreNotCachable_CreateNewClient test fails #100912
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] perftiger v8 - Failed to install prerequisites #100910
  • Expose DOTNET_JitNoInline in Release #100909
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions on 4/9/2024 5:02:41 AM #100923
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 4 Regressions on 4/8/2024 7:16:22 PM #100922
  • [NativeAOT] Passing Full Path to CppCompilerAndLinker Errors #100901

Closed

  • NativeAOT: Analysis doesn't produce warnings from generic parameter annotations from a string input #95140
  • SEHException when free GCHandle with FieldOffset #100902
  • NativeAOT. Starting Winforms using the DllMain entry point #100930
  • [wasm] UnmanagedCallersOnly generates incorrect wasm export types #96853
    9.0.0
  • Cannot compile native AoT ASP.NET Core application with latest .NET 9 daily build #100862
  • Add a BCL tensor API to represent multi-dimensional data for machine learning #24385
    9.0.0
  • WasmStripILAfterAOT causes broken runtime/compiler - System.InvalidProgramException: Common Language Runtime detected an invalid program #98041
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Methodical_d2 test failure #100757
    9.0.0
  • RyuJIT: Implement induction variable analysis #93143
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty(string) and similar methods should return the item/string #100870
  • [Avx512] The CompareGreaterThan methods of Avx512 contains redundant kmovq instructions #100903
    Future
  • HttpClient without initial proxy auth limits web scraping capability #100515
    9.0.0
  • Guidance on Compiling C++ Static Libraries with NativeAOT and Method Invocation #100735
  • [API Proposal]: Parallel.ForEachAsync with Partitioner support #96126
  • Revert workaround for C++ compiler bug #93526
    9.0.0
  • WhenAll().Wait() does not honor cancelation token #100894

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm][debugger] Support sending Assembly_Load events on wasm #100941
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove more helper frames #100939
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Skip cleanup of eventpipe for mono to prevent crashes on shutdown #100938
    area-Tracing-mono, 9.0.0
  • Arm64: Add SVE feature detection for Windows #100937
    arch-arm64-sve
  • [PERF] Add apt -y autoremove to our setup steps to keep machines clean. #100936
    area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP] Update entry assembly #100935
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Revert "disable optimizations for PopCount (#99796)" #100926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mini] Use atomics, instead of loader lock, for JIT wrappers #100925
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use BigMul in BigMul #100918
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add AppContext switch for OCSP Stapling #100917
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Allow helper calls that always throw to be marked as no-return #100900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add params ReadOnlySpan<T> overloads #100898
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve performance on virtual method processing #100897
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

Merged

  • [mono] Fix missing hash calc from #100847 #100876
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reimplement a few helpers with new RuntimeHelpers APIs #100846
    area-System.Runtime
  • Add cryptographic operation counts to prevent process crashes #100371
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Analyze generic parameter dataflow in `Type.GetType` #100904
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use invariant globalization in cdacreader project #100906
    needs-area-label
  • Delete some unnecessary RD.XML #100908
    needs-area-label
  • Avoid LINQ expressions in getting `GetService` #100916
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Revert "[wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 123.0.6312.58, windows: 123.0.6312.58" #100877
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Reduce number of reallocs inside interp_create_var_explicit #100801
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser] active issues #100933
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [workloads] Add Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WebAssembly.Pack to the msi generation #100934
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix unconditional success in CLR tests #100905
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Add a test around range check overflow #100820
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Minor fixes #100661
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Enable MaxResponseHeaderLength Tests for HTTP3 #100911
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: revise how synthesis treats handler regions #100899
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix resizing of ref slots bitset #100907
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Delete workaround for C++ compiler bug #100859
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Update Mariner 2.0 to Azure Linux 3.0 #100942
    needs-area-label
  • Fix NULL conversion warnings found in Alpine x64 Source-Build #100796
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Don't emit analyzer warnings for MakeGeneric understood by ILC #100858
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • Removing RUC from Default and Ambient attributes #100821
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Add unchecked version of stelem_ref interpreter opcode #99829
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] unify and vectorize implementation of decode_value metadata API #100048
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [mono] Optimize (typedef|table|declsec)_locator metadata loading #100157
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove various single-scenario YAML parameters in our build scripts and shift implementation responsibility to those scenarios #100115
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add PDB support for PersistedAssemblyBuilder #100706
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Add GT_SWIFT_ERROR_RET to represent loading error register upon return #100692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Drop generic type constraints from Unsafe.BitCast #100842
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • WIP: another workaround for hardcoded compiler versions #100828
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Guard against -1 Returned from sysconf for the Cache Sizes Causing Large Gen0 Sizes and Budgets for Certain Linux Distributions. #100575
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix native leak in CryptoNative_GetX509nameInfo #100793
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.5
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix native leak in CryptoNative_GetX509nameInfo #100794
    Servicing-rejected, area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix native leak in CryptoNative_GetX509nameInfo #100795
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.30
  • [Release/8.0] Remove preventing EH at shutdown #100836
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • [browser] with emscripten ASSERTIONS #100767
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mt] Add signalR WBT on WASM browser app #100723
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #100669
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add new line to be specified for JSON formatting #100890
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Debug missing wasmtime #100664
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for bounds check no throw assertions in range check and make overflow check more precise #100777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove received bytes length check #100619
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Select mono components #100407
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Avoid loading ICU data early during mono startup #100587
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • fix ping with TTL on Linux #99875
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix running tests with process isolation under naot #100331
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Search for seqpoints directly from jitinfo if it's not find on get_default_jit_mm #100841
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow 'add project reference' post action for existing projects #40132

Closed

  • API HttpWebRequest.GetSystemWebProxy not real time #40062

PullRequests

Created

  • Update loc branch target #40147
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update target branch #40145
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget-team as CODEOWNER for dotnet-list-package #40139
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • 4xx branding #40138
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #40137
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow 'Add project reference' for existing projects #40133
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Update the help text for dotnet tool run and dotnet tool local install #39827
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add RuntimeHostConfigurationOption for COM descriptor support #40106
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #40117
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    Area-Tools
  • Merge dotnet/Installer `src` and `test` folder histories #40084
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-11

Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload unusable with CS8055 if a file created via "Move type to X.cs" is not touched by the user #72984
  • Indention is wrong in raw string literals #72982
  • csc.exe exited with code -2146232797 when using primary constructor with event in interface #72981
  • Improve source generator UX by fishing for dependencies #72980

Closed

  • Language changes are breaking real-world use of dynamic #72750
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Hot Reload brokered service registration #72989
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2428680 #72988
    auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72987
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify ForAttributeWithMetadataName #72979
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Workaround for ILanguageService exports with no Layer #72986
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use string syntax attribute to highlight tests #72924
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Optimize OOP compilation of HasSourceGenerators. #72978
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify a small piece of project system batching code #72985
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Invocations statically bound in presence of dynamic arguments should have dynamic result if their dynamic binding succeeded in C# 12 #72964
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add some crash dump tips for Linux #72719
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Sync project level info in parallel. #72976
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch from an ImmutableDictionary to a FrozenDictionary/Array #72973
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Sync solution contents consistently #72860
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add a unit test to cover the unified setting's registration file. #72946
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expose a way for Razor to register capabilities into the AlwaysActivateInProcLanguageClient #72609
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Sync small-sized information across all projects in one batch call. #72975
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add AuthorizationOptions.PreferAllowAnonymous option #55093
  • Update Wix versions #55087
    Infrastructure
  • Chrome 123.0.6312.123 throws errors when accessing InteractiveServer applications #55085
  • how to create custom external provider authentication (sign-in with ethereum) #55083
  • Questions about Blazor component disposal #55082
  • How to make Url Page() does not check routing tables #55079
  • Make QuickGrids support Table features like Colgroup, Colspan, rowspan and more styling #55077
    Backlog
  • HttpResponse.OnCompleted callback not invoked on exception when using TestServer #55076
  • Updating Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer to 8.0.4 causing issues #55075
  • Perf regression: mvc #55074
  • SPA startup error - TimeoutException: The create-react-app server did not start listening for requests within the timeout period of 120 seconds. #55073

Closed

  • Add `AddHubOptions<>` SignalR extension to `IServiceCollection` #54116
  • BearerToken Authentication not working from Controller #54385
  • .NET 8 Blazor - StreamRendering - Magic Pill or Future Headache? #54157
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Upgrade Blazor WASM Authentication 'oidc-client' dependency to 'oidc-client-ts' #55081
  • [Hybrid] Animation lag during 1st render fragment load #54879
  • Updating a `workload` during the "patch Tuesday" release window corrupts most dotnet commands on Linux and macOS #55032
  • Security bypass vulnerability in ASP.NET Core #55070
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55043
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55044
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55046
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55045
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55047
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55048
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55049
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55051
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55050
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55052
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #55053
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55067
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #55035
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #55022
  • Perf regression: fortunes #55036
  • Perf improvement: https #55065
  • Perf regression: fortunes #55066
  • [.net 8] Blazor webassembly debugger doesn't stop on exception #54834
  • Using Standard OIDC Authentication and CustomAuthenticationStateProvider Together Causes Error #54268
  • Binding content in Blazor results in duplication when element is initially empty. #54806
  • [Blazor]: Why enhance naviagation would clear the <head> element? #54658

PullRequests

Created

  • ALWAYS include the Vary Accept-Encoding header when response compression is enabled #55092
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Switch to dnceng pool for SDL tasks #55090
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Wix version #55088
    area-infrastructure
  • Add HybridCache public API #55084
    feature-caching, area-runtime
  • #49263 #55078
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #55037
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.30
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #55038
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.19
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #55034
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.5
  • Add entry to aspnetcore to propagate EFCore into the VMR #55089
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Reuse known keys in XmlKeyManager #54490
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview4
  • Add support for generating OpenAPI responses #55020
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Updated

  • Improve the style for developer exception page #55042
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Introduce a logger provider that counts warnings and errors #54846
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Using SearchValues in ContentDispositionHeaderValue #55039
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add support for generating OpenAPI request bodies #55040
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-routing
  • update project templates use primary constructors #55006
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XAML ContentPage.Content required for data to appear. #21790
  • Label FormattedString Span on Windows Bleeds Color Between Span Tag Text #21789
  • [WinUI] Creating a complex grid is very slow #21787
  • HttpClient and AcceptEncoding gzip on Android stoped working after latest SR4 release. #21786
  • Workload install error - Unable to install maui workload on Windows - .NET 9 Preview 3 #21784
  • TabbedPage control problem #21781
    Backlog
  • ListView view DataTemplateSelector mixes templates on Android with CachingStrategy on RecycleElement #21780
    Backlog
  • Android-CollectionView - MeasureFIrstItem breaks layout #21778
    Backlog
  • Android Java Library Binding breaks intellisense, despite build/run working #21777
    Backlog
  • DesignMode.IsDesignModeEnabled always returns true when in Debug (with Hot Reload enabled?), breaking OrientationStateTrigger #21776
  • Android Platform App Theme does not automatically update when switching themes #21774
  • FontImageSource with Font Weight and Font Attributes #21772
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI IOS APP CRASH on Launch Release Mode (From Azure CI/CD pipeline) after updating the MAUI.Controls to 8.0.20 #21770
  • Grid layout on iOS does not calculate row height correctly when a BoxView spans several rows #21768

Closed

  • CollectionView+FormattedString Poor Performance #14222
    Backlog
  • Issues fetching data during splash screen loading (deadlock) #21763
  • Entry Text changing to black on slider change when is light mode iOS #21731
  • `MauiFont` not usable if added in `MauiLibrary` #21771
  • MAUI Blazor app with long reference paths fails to Deploy on Windows #10068
  • Unable to cache image Exception after version 8.0.9 #21748
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Image/MauiImage does not render a particular SVG #19448
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.0] [Android] - DataBinding not working inside ScrollView with nested elements #17211
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • MAUI can't get file data from Windows Explorer by Drag&Drop and app will crash #6080
    Under Consideration
  • Verified this issue with Visual Studio Enterprise 17.9.0 Preview 4. Can not repro on Android platforms with sample project. The theme can be changed automatically on the emulator without debugging again. #21773
  • very High Load time in Bindable Layout with vertical Stack Layout #21405
    Backlog
  • random crash on startup dotnet maui app android #21588
  • Starts running and pause in Program.cs #21598
  • MAUI's Entry.TextChanged event is not called if Entry.Text is bound #21597

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Catalyst,Windows] Allow drag item from outside the app #21684
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • Merge the fixes on SR4 into main #21782
  • Add s/triaged label for issues opened by core team #21775
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Move CollectionViewItemsLayoutUpdate to appium #21767
    area/collectionview 📃, area/testing
  • [ios/catalyst] avoid duplicating `UIView.Subviews` arrays #21765
  • Use the path for determining the extension #21761

Updated

  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • [iOS] Allow compat iOS buttons to resize image and to respect spacing and padding #21759
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers #21505
  • fix issue in orientation of images #21458
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing, stale
  • [X] Fix TargetType simplification bug #21764
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Windows] Fix pointer released event not being handled on ImageButton #21766
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21423
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [UI Testing] Split mouse and touch Appium actions and added pending ones (TouchAndHold etc) #21305
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #21304
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Fix gestures not working on Button #20988
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button, area/gestures
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Projecting an Entity with Nested JSON Collections Causes a `NullReferenceException` #33518
  • AOT: flow IProperty information to materializer's CreateGetValueExpression for dealing with properties with non-default converters #33517
  • Precompiled queries: pregenerate relational commands via IRelationalCommandBuilderFactory #33516
    Backlog
  • Precompiled queries: lift objects to make them common across query interceptors #33515
    Backlog
  • Support the new Azure SQL regular expression functions #33514
    Backlog

Closed

  • Query/AOT: fix remaining AOT materializer exceptions #33383
  • Duplicated records returned in a projection #33105

PullRequests

Created

  • Make sure table name inferred from DbSet name is has proper length based on maximum length for identifiers. #33513

Updated

  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351
  • Pregenerate SQL for precompiled queries #33510

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-11
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Update table #19447
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #19446
  • 4xx branding #19443
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #19442
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #19441
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #19440
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #19439
  • Publish PRs for Source-Build Test Results #19434
  • Build the SourceBuilt tarball in the publish job and include the merged vertical manifest in it. #19433

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #19426
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #19401
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #19425
  • Add source mapping for dotnet/efcore #19432
  • Removed unnecessary cloaking rules for appinsights #19435
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #19431

Updated

  • Update-eol-versions-8.0.1xx #19318
  • Test SBRP changes #19419
    DO NOT MERGE
  • Add Unified Build produced NuGet package validation against official build #19304
  • Update WiX to 3.14.1.8722 #19406
    Servicing-consider
  • Add remaining PGO legs for the VMR #19311
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2428582 #19344
  • Redo "NGEN Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver.dll and its dependencies" for devenv only #19399
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.5
  • Use the repo asset manifests to discover dependency versions #19389
  • Add Join-Verticals task, use it at the final Join Point #19369
  • [VMR] light up Mono LLVM lanes #19398
    DO NOT MERGE
